name: suitCSS Class Names
description: regex to match suit css class names
content:
someComponent
someComponent-good
someComponent-good.is-something
someComponent-good--good
someComponent-goodCase--good
someComponent--good
someComponent--goodCase

SomeComponent-case

someComponent--female__hand
